xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/745179-Boo! The Movie 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/xTivScC7Q4TGA5YghnZeRHvD4of.jpg Set in the midwest town of Rankin, "Boo!" revolves around the mysterious drowning of Emma Manning (Molly Kaufman), A death that still haunts the small community and is grist for adolescent games that turn into terror. Rankin's twenty-something townies taunt the rich kids at the local college with tales of death. Kera (Lauren Carter) is a curious local drawn to the mystery...no matter where it takes her. Boo! The Movie
